ARABIC: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يُنَادُونَكَ مِن وَرَآءِ ٱلْحُجُرَٰتِ أَكْثَرُهُمْ لَا يَعْقِلُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: As for those who call out to you from outside your private quarters, most of them do not use their intellect.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Many of those who call you from outside the apartments are not considerate.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Surely most of those who call out to you, (O Prophet), from behind the apartments, are devoid of understanding.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Most of those who call you from behind the private chambers do not have any understanding.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed most of those who call you from outside the chambers do not have sense.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, those who call you from behind the dwellings, most of them have no sense.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: (As for) those who call out to you from behind the private chambers, surely most of them do not understand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Surely those who call unto thee from behind the apartments, the most of them do not understand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! those who call thee from behind the private apartments, most of them have no sense.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: those who call out to you from outside your apartments are lacking in understanding.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily those who call aloud Unto thee from without the inner apartments, most of them reflect not."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed those who call you from behind the apartments, most of them do not use their reason.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Those who shout out to thee from without the inner apartments - most of them lack understanding.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily! Those who call you from behind the dwellings, most of them have no sense.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Whereas those who call out to you from behind the apartments, most of them lack understanding.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Those who call you from behind the chambers—most of them do not understand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, those who call you, [O Muhammad], from behind the chambers - most of them do not use reason.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [49:4] The following was revealed regarding a group of people who came to see the Prophet (s) during the midday [resting] period while he was in his house, and called out to him: Truly those who call you from behind the apartments, the [private] chambers of his womenfolk (hujurāt is the plural of hujra, which is an area of ground on which stones are laid [yuhjaru ‘alayhi] to form a wall or the like), and it happened that each one   of them called out, in that rough and crude Bedouin manner, from behind one of the apartments, as they did not know in which apartment he was, most of them do not understand, given the way in which they acted, your exalted status and the reverence that befits it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! those who call thee from behind the private apartment) this was revealed about a folk from Banu 'Anbar, from the Khuza'ah tribe to whom the Prophet (pbuh) sent a military expedition under the leadership of 'Uyaynah Ibn Hisn al-Fazari. When they heard of the advance of this expedition towards them, they fled, leaving behind their wives and children and properties. Their wives and children were taken captive and brought to the Prophet (pbuh). The men who fled went to Medina to ransom their wives and children and entered the city at the time of the siesta. They called: "0 Muhammad, come out to see us", while he was 601 sleeping. Allah censured them for doing so, saying: (Lo! those who call you from behind the private apartment most of them) all of them (have no sense) do not understand Allah's command or divine Oneness nor the reverence due to Allah's Messenger.
